item.title: Watchtowers, Lightning Privacy
item.description: Speaker 0: 00:00:00 I came into Bitcoin because I like peer-to-peer. I discover more things that I love by doing so. And again, these are not feelings, but they are feelings related to research. Sorry, failing time. Speaker 1: 00:00:12 We’re going to make sure our editor takes out The love word.
